query:
SELECT
  LUGARES.CARRIER_SERIAL_NUM CARRIER_SERIAL_NUM,
  LUGARES.CARRIER_SITE CARRIER_SITE,
  LUGARES.SERIAL_NUM SERIAL_NUM,
  STATUS,
  LUGARES.LAST_UPD_DATE LAST_UPD_DATE,
  LASER1ID,LASER2ID,LASER3ID,LASER4ID,
  PART_CODE_NAME,
  LASER1PARTTYPE,LASER2PARTTYPE,LASER3PARTTYPE,LASER4PARTTYPE,
  SYSTEM_ID Maquina_OSA,
  plc_id
FROM
  (SELECT *
  FROM CARRIER_SITE
  WHERE CARRIER_SERIAL_NUM = '149571056') LUGARES
INNER JOIN
  los_assembly
INNER JOIN
  (SELECT
    assy_serial_num sn_trk,
    SERIAL_NUM PLC_ID
  FROM trk_assembly
    WHERE PART_NUM LIKE 'A12TQ0086%')
ON SERIAL_NUM = sn_trk
ON LUGARES.SERIAL_NUM = los_assembly.SERIAL_NUM;
